```{r,include=FALSE}
library(openMSE)
printDesc <- function(slot, class="Stock") {
  Desc <- get(paste0(class, "Description"))
  Desc$Description[which(Desc$Slot == slot)]
}
```

### Size_area_1
`r printDesc("Size_area_1")`

### Frac_area_1 
`r printDesc("Frac_area_1")`

### Prob_staying
`r printDesc("Prob_staying")`

### Custom Parameters

- more than 2 areas
- spatial closures by year
